value:
$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|GWAAAAARRRRGH!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you all right, Princess Reginn?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Yes. I know what I need to do.
I won't hide from it anymore.$k$p$EFace_Pain2|If I don't stop him, other people
will lose their lives...$k$p$EFace_Anger|I have enough blood on my hands...
I may not be able to undo all my
brothers have done, but I have to try!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Reginn...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|NGYAAAHH!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|FÁFNIR! Your reign of chaos ends
here and now. I will stop you myself!$k$p

$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|Gwahhh... Rrrr... Ungh...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Fáfnir...$k$pAs Niðavellir's true princess,
I cannot tolerate your treatment
of my people.$k$pWith this sword, Gramr, I will end
you now... Here I come!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_STING1|$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$Fi500|$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Normal,Face|GWA—$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Stain,Face_Pain|...$k$pI...I am... M-my name...$k$p

$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|*sniff*$k$p...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Reginn, I know I asked you to stop
him, but I didn't say you had to feel
good about it. It's OK to cry.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Thank you, Princess Dagr.$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Go to him. Hurry.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Brother! Fáfnir...$k$p*sniff* Finally I can hug you again,
like we used to...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Stain,Face_Pain|...Fá...fnir?$k$pN-no... My name... Yes...
My name was...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Tell me, Brother...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Fáfnir... Did you regain your
memories of the world you
came from?!$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Stain,Face_Pain|Yes... I remember...$k$pI remember all of it...$k$pI was a soldier...a member of the
military force of a small country...$k$pI fought every day and rose up the
ranks...to provide for my family...$k$pI had...a wife...and a daughter...
I just wanted to give them a
good life...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Y-you had a wife?! And a daughter?!
I had no idea...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Stain,Face_Pain|When I was summoned here, I had
no idea what had happened... All I
could do was fight to survive...$k$pAh... And then... And then I saw Ótr
holding you... Like you were his dear
little sister...$k$p...Urgh!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-Brother! Stay with me!$k$pEverything will be all right now.$k$pWe can send you back to your world
again, right, $Nu?$k$pAnd you can see... You can see
your real family again!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Reginn... I'm sorry, but...
It's too late...$k$p$WmMEID_ファフニール,ch00_32_Fafnir2_M_Stain,Face_Pain|Ah... I would like to see it...
one last time...$k$pBut...I know, after what I've done...
I deserve no kindness...$k$p$EFace_Normal2|Reginn... Ótr...$k$pYou were...also...my r-real fa...mi...$k$p...$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...F-Fáfnir?$k$pBrother...$k$p$EFace_Cry|*sob*$k$pBrother! My dear, dear brother...
I'm so sorry, Fáfnir! I'm so, so sorry...$k$p$Sbs1500|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$w0|
